**CalgaryR** is a community of data enthusiasts and endeavors working with R.  We are pursuing a continuing education and creating a self-development opportunity from experiences shared by our friends.  **[Chel Hee Lee](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gnustats/){target="_blank"}**, **[Cliff Sobchuk](https://www.linkedin.com/in/cliff-sobchuk/){target="_blank"}**, **[Jonathan Lin](https://github.com/jonlinca){target="_blank"}**, **[Dylan Loader](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dylan-loader/){target="_blank"}**, **[Adames Pablo](https://www.linkedin.com/in/adames-pablo-87149711/){target="_blank"}**, **[Jennifer Lee](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jenniferleelibrarian/?originalSubdomain=ca){target="_blank"}**, **[John Brosz](https://www.linkedin.com/in/john-brosz-65b4565/?originalSubdomain=ca){target="_blank"}**, **[Byron Chu](https://www.linkedin.com/in/byron-chu/?originalSubdomain=ca){target="_blank"}**, and **[Marta Vidal Garcia](http://marta-vidal-garcia.weebly.com/)**  are volunteered to organize events.   If you are interested in sponsoring our community, hosting a meeting, or making sugggestions, please feel free to contact one of the organizers.   Feedback or question via [email to Chel](mailto:imstatsbee@gmail.com) is of course most appreciated.  Please join our [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/Calgary-R-User-Group/){target="_blank"} and  [public workspace on Slack](https://yyc-r.slack.com/){target="_blank"}.
